name: Phil Ippers: Double Agent
description:
How To Play:
Deflect the Bullets from the penguins back towards the cannons & place a cannon before your suspicion metre runs out, or your enemies will find out that you're a double agent.

Story:
You are secret agent Phil Ippers, a penguin employed as a double agent to allow penguins to infiltrate a base successfully.

This is my first 72 hours jam, as you may be able to tell. I don't think the game is well designed and isn't too fun, and I didn't get to playtest it. I hope you enjoy, though!
